_Autogenerated Tag Syntax Documentation:_

---
Dump all of the rotamers for a given amino acid type at the rsd_index position into individual PDB files

```xml
<DumpSingleResidueRotamers name="(&string;)"
        rsd_index="(&non_negative_integer;)" prefix="(&string;)"
        write_rotamers_to_pdbs="(&bool;)" all_positions="(&bool;)" />
```

-   **rsd_index**: Position at which to enumerate rotamers
-   **prefix**: Prefix for output rotamer info file and pdbs when specified
-   **write_rotamers_to_pdbs**: Should we write the rotamers out to individual PDB files?
-   **all_positions**: Dump rotamers at all pdb positions

---
